tool_description: Daily Petrol Diesel Prices Live in Indian Cities
name: Live Petrol Diesel Price India
title: Live Petrol Diesel Price India

api_list.name: CityWise Diesel History
api_list.description:
Get the last 10 days historical Diesel  prices of any city.

You will need to provide cityID and stateID for the city you need to get data.

you can check List of City and List of State endpoint for Getting cityID and stateID.

api_list.name: CityWise Petrol History
api_list.description:
Get the last 10 days historical prices of any city.

You will need to provide cityID and stateID for the city you need to get data.

you can check List of City and List of State endpoint for Getting cityID and stateID.

api_list.name: Search Diesel Price Today in a STATE
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Diesel in any STATE of India. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter the  stateID to findout the live diesel price of a city.

*for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.*

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint

api_list.name: Search Petrol Price Today in a STATE
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Petrol in any STATE of India. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter the  stateID to findout the live petrol price of a city.
for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint

api_list.name: All States Diesel Price Today
api_list.description: Get the live price of Diesel in All states. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-petrol-diesel-price-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/diesel-state-all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-petrol-diesel-price-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Cities  Petrol Price Today
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Petrol in All city of a state. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter  stateID to findout the live Petrol price of all cities of a state.

*for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.*

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint

api_list.name: All Cities  Diesel Price Today
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Diesel in All city of a state. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter the  stateID to findout the live Diesel price of all cities of a state .

*for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.*

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint

api_list.name: List of States
api_list.description: This is the total list of  states with stateID. You can use this to get stateID for other endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-petrol-diesel-price-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/FuelStateList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-petrol-diesel-price-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of Cities
api_list.description: This is the total list of cities filtered by states. You can use this to get cityID for other endpoints.

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find **stateID** from List of States Endpoint.

api_list.name: Search Diesel Price Today in a CITY
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Diesel in any city of India. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter the cityID and stateID to findout the live Diesel price of a city.
for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.

required_parameters.name: cityID
required_parameters.description: You can find **cityID** of a state via the 'City List' Endpoint

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint

api_list.name: Search Petrol Price Today in a CITY
api_list.description:
Get the live price of Petrol in any city of India. You will also get the change in price comparison for the same.

You will need to enter the cityID and stateID to findout the live petrol price of a city.
for cityID and stateID you can check the endpoint for cityList and StateList.

required_parameters.name: cityID
required_parameters.description: You can find **cityID** of a state via the 'City List' Endpoint

required_parameters.name: stateID
required_parameters.description: You can find  **stateID** via the 'State List' Endpoint
